summary: An adaptation of the Oblivion mod Dark Lillith by Hentai for UNPB-BBP with working weight slider.
descriptionHtml:
Update 8/31: added non-BBP patch for those who don\'t want to jiggle when they wiggle.

Hentai\'s Dark Lillith Armor for UNPB-BBP
adaptation by selobl
Skyrim v1.6 or greater

Description:

This armor is based on the Oblivion mod \"Dark Lillith\" by Hentai http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/21579. All artistic value is attributed to Hentai, I have simply modified the original to work in SKyrim with my body mod of choice. 

I adapted the meshes for the UNPB-BBP body with working weight slider
I created new gloves by slicing and dicing UNPB meshes (what, you were expecting me to adapt HGEC hands?)
I derived _m textures from the originals
I created inventory meshes
I made the esp

I assigned the pieces to Biped Object slots according to the standard here: http://www.creationkit.com/Biped_Object

The pieces are craftable at any forge. A light armor version is under leather, and is upgradable at any workbench. 

Yes, I called it armor. I gave it armor rating, so in the context of the game it\'s considered armor. If the look is unappealing, try playing the game with your eyes closed.

Required mods:

UNPB-BBP by Calyps
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899

If you don\'t properly install the BBP package this mod will not work and your game will probably CTD, or you might just get spooky-boobs. If you can\'t figure out BBP, you should spend your time learning research and trouble shooting skills instead of wasting time playing with boobie mods.

A UNP-compatible texture, I use the latest by Dimon99

UNP by Dimon99
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

BBP animations if you want to see the jiggly-bits:

Victorias High Heel walk Animation plus BBP by xp32
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13272

Installation:

I recommend
Wrye Bash
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840 
If you\'re using it, I doubt I need to explain it.

or you could unzip the archive into your Data folder.

NMM - might work, I don\'t use NMM. Ask your colleagues on the forums how to install via NMM.

KNOWN ISSUES:
could be some clipping in some poses or animations
I\'m busy in RL and might not support this mod to a professional standard


Future plans:
squash any bugs I missed
non-BBP meshes for very special people, when time allows
I may tweak the esp to include heavy and cloth. maybe.

NOTE: I won\'t make a CBBE version - Nikitaa already has an amazing version:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13067
Also, despite good intentions, I\'m not likely to complete a stock UNP, because it will take limited modding time away from doing another UNPB-BBP mod


Re-Use:
I\'ll quote Hentai on this:

1. Feel free to use everything in this file.

2. Everything I made for Oblivion is free to convert to Skyrim. Since Im not going to convert them myself.

3. Do not upload this file on Steam Workshop until furthur notice. ( I like Nexus so much more as a modder)

be considerate and give Hentai, Calyps and me credit


CREDITS and THANKS

thanks to Hentai/Zotman12 and Calyps

Dark Lillith by Hentai/Zotman12
http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/21579

UNPB-BBP by Calyps
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899

Caliente\'s tutorial and Nif Cleaner
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

Lots of fine folks at tesadventures.com for technical info, inspiration and encouragement

LeckerHamster on Youtube for insight into inventory meshes

Apachii, Halofarm, Psychos1s and Brokefoot for the hair, poses and race used in screenshots

DarkOne and Skyrim Nexus for a place to discover and share mods

Tools used:
Blender
Nikskope
GIMP
NifCleaner by Caliente
Creation Kit
7 Zip
Notepad
author: selobl
